titleStmt.title: The humble petition of the knights, iustices of the peace, gentlemen, ministers, free-holders and others of the countie of Cornwall. Being, the true copie of the agrievances of the said whole countie, as it was delivered April the 22. 1642. (to the House of Commons) by some thereunto appointed. H. Elsynge, Cler. Parl. D. Com.
Humble petition of the knights, justices of the peace, gentlemen, ministers, free-holders and others of the countie of Cornwall.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R.O. and G.D. for John Bartlet, and are to be sold at his Shop in Pauls-Church-yard, at the Signe of the gilded Cup,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his Shop in Pauls-Church-yard, at the Signe of the gilded Cup
